name: just a plug-in test
description:
Testing apex.world plug-in description styling.

Free Plug-in under MIT License

All FOS plug-ins are released under MIT License, which essentially means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if commercial or private use.

Overview

Using the FOS test plug-in we are able to find out how apex.world supports styling of its description and which parts of the text are seen on Card View, which on Report View, and which on the Detail View.
